name: Fast Track Systems Monitor
short_description: Fast Track Systems Monitor (FTMON) is an open source monitoring engine (written in Perl) that can be integrated with other systems management vendor solutions. It also defines a standard that allows applications/devices to be instrumented rapidly.
summary: Fast Track Systems Monitor (FTMON) is an open source monitoring engine

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
